channel.title: [Showoff] Ocean Blade
channel.description: i decided to make this just a showoff, due to my .datmaker f***ing up the model trajically... i must re-do the whole thing.. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wa0kew.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Showoff] Ocean Blade
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

I’d fix it but I don’t have a computer ATM. Im on Ipod. I get my comp back in about 1 week from today

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:14, topic:283412”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=374519.msg2826509#msg2826509 date=1245037860]

It’s too flat. It’s 3d, but it’s flat. Add some shape to it… Extrude can help fix that if you know how to use it

acually dylan i just recently learned about putting a blade onto it… instead of it being a hunk of dull faces…so ill just get better as i go…

Definately. Don’t take y previous comment as an insult. I meant it as if you were experienced with using extrude, you could add a nice unique shape to it. Ipersonally find extrude to be the most useful tool. I use it more than everything else since I model from a cube.
[/quote]
Aah, i use the “Tri” tool in create for my models. I used to need a line of every peice but im getting decient enough. If you want i can put it on my mediafire and send u link and u can fix (my datmaker really messed it up tho)[/quote]n

Read full topic

It’s too flat. It’s 3d, but it’s flat. Add some shape to it… Extrude can help fix that if you know how to use it

acually dylan i just recently learned about putting a blade onto it… instead of it being a hunk of dull faces…so ill just get better as i go…
[/quote]
Definately. Don’t take y previous comment as an insult. I meant it as if you were experienced with using extrude, you could add a nice unique shape to it. Ipersonally find extrude to be the most useful tool. I use it more than everything else since I model from a cube.[/quote]
Aah, i use the “Tri” tool in create for my models. I used to need a line of every peice but im getting decient enough. If you want i can put it on my mediafire and send u link and u can fix (my datmaker really messed it up tho)

Read full topic

acually dylan i just recently learned about putting a blade onto it… instead of it being a hunk of dull faces…so ill just get better as i go…[/quote]
Definately. Don’t take y previous comment as an insult. I meant it as if you were experienced with using extrude, you could add a nice unique shape to it. Ipersonally find extrude to be the most useful tool. I use it more than everything else since I model from a cube.

item.title: [Showoff] Ocean Blade
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“dclawsftw, post:7, topic:283412”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=374519.msg2824102#msg2824102 date=1244847576]

THe top of the blade looks cool,. But the handle needs a LOT of work

u shoulda seen the pic i was working with… lol this was a chanlenge from my friend across the street… myns ALOT beter than his… he took 3 hours… this took me 20 mins
[/quote]
Well if it only took 20 minutes you should have put more time into the handle to get it just right.[/quote]
i cant ever get good handles… im still learning on blade sided parts… im more worried about a blade than a handle cause in-game you wont pay much attention to a handle…

Read full topic
